SKT_FIRST.name: Requiem
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> if the target was a Fire enemy.
description: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_1_1]</color>. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_1_3]</color> if the target was a Fire enemy.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다. 대상이 화속성이라면 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。対象が火属性の場合<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>UPさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Shura Slash
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nThis skill is always treated as having a <color=#28d9ed>favorable attribute</color> and its cooldown resets if you have a buff.\nEach time you use <color=#28d9ed>Rending Rakshasa</color>, your <color=#28d9ed>Critical Damage</color> increases by <color=#28d9ed>7%</color> (up to 5 stacks).

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nReduces Doujikiri Yasutsuna Cooldown by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n【童子切安綱】スキルターン-1ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreased damage (With additional increased damage against Fire enemies)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n피해 증가 (화속성 적에게는 추가로 피해 증가)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nダメージUP(火属性の敵には\n追加でダメージUP)

description: Attacks all enemies.\nThis attack always deals <color=#28d9ed>advantageous damage</color>. Resets cooldown if the caster has a buff.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 항상 <color=#28d9ed>유리한 상성</color>으로 적용되며 강화 효과 보유 시 쿨타임이 초기화됩니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>나찰 가르기</color>를 사용할 때마다 <color=#28d9ed>치명 피해량</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>7%</color> 증가합니다. (최대 5회 누적)
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体を攻撃します。\nこのスキルは常に<color=#28d9ed>有利属性</color>として扱われ、強化効果を保有している場合、スキルターンが初期化されます。\n<color=#28d9ed>羅刹斬り</color>を使用するたびに<color=#28d9ed>クリティカルダメージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>7%</color>上昇します(最大5回累積)。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Doujikiri Yasutsuna
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When using this skill, increases own <color=#28d9ed>Critical Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns and attacks all enemies. \nEach time <color=#28d9ed>Dojigiri Yasutsuna</color> is used, increases own <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. (Stacks up to 3 times)
description: When using this skill, <color=#28d9ed>increases</color> the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000019_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nEach time <color=#28d9ed>Doujikiri Yasutsuna</color> is used increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_3_2]</color>. (Max 3 stacks)
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 스킬 사용 시 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>증가</color>시키고 적 전체를 공격합니다. \n<color=#28d9ed>도지기리 야스츠나</color>를 사용할 때마다 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 증가합니다. (최대 3회 누적)
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: スキル使用時、<color=#28d9ed>2</color>ターンの間、自身の<color=#28d9ed>クリティカル発生率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>上昇</color>させ、敵全体を攻撃する。\n<color=#28d9ed>童子切安綱</color>を使用するたびに、自身の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>上昇する。(最大3回まで累積)

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: The caster's Skill Chain attacks always have elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: The caster's Skill Chain attacks always have elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 자신의 스킬 체인 공격이 항상 유리한 상성으로 적용됩니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:この攻撃は敵の属性を無視し、有利属性の攻撃判定でダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。
